description:
Everyone has a circle of friends they hang out with. But even within a small group there are smaller groups of friends, best friends and, here's where it gets complicated, boyfriends and girlfriends. Sometimes relationships just develop in a way where you're not exactly sure what you are to the other person. Which is the problem Tsumiki has when it comes to Io. Io's as tall and easygoing as Tsumiki is short in both temper and stature, but he also seems to be totally clueless about how she's starting to feel. Yet, at times, he's almost too affectionate. It's just confusing and irritating. And their prankster friends Mayoi and Sakaki aren't much help. Especially Mayoi, as it gives her one more thing to tease Tsumiki over. Hime, the fifth member of their usual gang of five isn't much better, because she's not really well connected to reality anyway. Which leaves Tsumiki stuck in a quandary. Are she and Io just best friends? And is it worth risking that for what Tsumiki wants?

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

[Profile (Racoon Dog)](https://www.raccoon-dog.co.jp/talent/m01-okamoto.html
) | [Blog](https://lineblog.me/nobuhiko_okamoto/) | [Old Blog (Inactive)](http://blog.livedoor.jp/okamoto_teki_fukei/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ok_nobuhiko) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nobuhiko_cacao/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nobuhiko_Okamoto) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/岡本信彦)

- Revealed as the sixth member of Kiramune on October 24, 2011; debuted on May 23, 2012.
- Hosts Dengeki Girl's Smile with [Ryouhei Kimura](https://anilist.co/staff/96762/Ryouhei-Kimura)
- Married to fellow seiyuu [Asuka Oogame](https://anilist.co/staff/102489). 

Previously affiliated with the agency Pro-Fit. After the agency announced that they would be shutting down operation in 2022, he would be transferring to his own agency "Raccoon Dog", along with several other Pro-Fit talents.

__Graduated:__ Kunitachi College of Music (Department of Composition)

[Artist Profile (Miracle Bus)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/masaruyokoyama) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/masaruyokoyama)

**Yokoyama Masaru** is a Japanese composer, arranger, keyboardist and programmer affiliated with Miracle Bus.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/01_chan)

He graduated from Yoyogi Animation school and joined Studio Junio afterwards. After leaving Studio Junio, he became a freelancer and often works with Studio Sunrise and GONZO.
In 2008, him and former GONZO producer Ikeda Touyo founded Encourage Films Co., Ltd, with a capital of 5 million yen.
Ikeda Touyo would serve as the representative director and president of Encourage Films. 
With the death of Ikeda Touyo, on February 17, 2013, he was appointed as the representative director and CEO of Encourage Films.

__Current Residence:__ Tokyo, Japan
__Height:__ 150.3 cm
__Hobbies and Abilities:__ fashion, shopping, memorization
__Agency:__ 81 Produce

[Profile (81 Produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=169) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/rumirumi_81pro) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/rumirumi_81/) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/rumiokubo/) | [Web Diary](http://gree.jp/ookubo_rumi) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/30941.html) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/OkuboRumi927) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rumi_Okubo) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%A4%A7%E4%B9%85%E4%BF%9D%E7%91%A0%E7%BE%8E)

She was discovered in 81 Produce's 3rd Seiyuu Audition in August, 2009, becoming one of the seven finalists amongst 1,109 who took initially part and won the excellence prize in the end. She made her debut in a minor role for the anime [Sasameki Koto](https://anilist.co/anime/6203).

(Source: AniDB)

__Non-anime roles:__

- Tia in "Goddess of Victory: Nikke" (VG)
_Note: Not to be confused with the [producer](https://anilist.co/staff/222835/)._

__[Profile (IOSYS)](https://www.iosysos.com/creator-arm.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ARM_IOSYS)__

__ARM__ is a Japanese lyricist, composer, arranger and member of doujin circle IOSYS, he has arranged over 600 songs and has released a solo album in addition to dozens of compilations. He also sings, plays guitar, drums and piano. Produces a variety of music from electro to rock to acoustic and everywhere in between.
